title: Maggie L Walker National Historic Site: Donate
body: Donate       Thank you for your interest in supporting Maggie L. Walker National Historic Site. Your donation will enhance the programs and activities to protect park resources and provide visitor services for Maggie L. Walker National Historic Site. Philanthropic contributions continue to make a significant difference and we welcome and are grateful for your support.  The park is able to accept direct donations. If you are interested in donating to the park you may contact the Superintendent by phone (804-771-2808) or email. Donations may be sent to: Superintendent David Ruth Maggie L. Walker National Historic Site 3215 East Broad Street Richmond, VA 23223
